- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks** for online ordering & basic management.[1][4]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$56,000–$72,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$87,500–$112,500**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **security/PCI advisor** (light).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- PCI-DSS SAQ A program: **$3k–$8k** (policies, quarterly scans).  

---

## 7. Fitness / Wellness MVP  
*(Mindbody-style scheduling, workout tracker)*

**Core MVP features**

- User profiles with basic health preferences.  
- Class/appointment scheduling with trainers/locations.  
- Simple subscription or pass management.  
- Workout logging (sets, reps, time) and history.  
- Notifications and reminders.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js; React Native or Flutter app if mobile-first.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) / Django / Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: standard AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: general wellness; avoid storing diagnostic/clinical PHI to stay out of strict HIPAA.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks**.[1][4][6]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$56,000–$72,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$87,500–$112,500**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend/mobile.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Typical SaaS legal/privacy work: **$3k–$6k**.  

---

## 8. Travel / Hospitality MVP  
*(TripAdvisor-style, basic booking engine)*

**Core MVP features**

- Property/experience listings + search & filter.  
- User accounts with favorites & reviews (simple).  
- Booking workflow: availability calendar, request/confirm.  
- Payment for bookings (Stripe, Braintree).  
- Basic host dashboard: availability, pricing, reservations list.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; consider Redis for availability lookups later.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: PCI-lite (via processor), GDPR/CCPA readiness.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX (booking UX).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Payment/compliance: **$3k–$8k** PCI-lite.  
- Travel-specific terms & cancellation policies: **$2k–$5k** legal.  

---

## 9. Education / LMS MVP  
*(Canvas-style, Teachable-style)*

**Core MVP features**

- Multi-role accounts: admin, instructor, student.  
- Course creation with modules (video, docs, quizzes basic).  
- Enrollment & access management.  
- Simple progress tracking & gradebook-lite.  
- Messaging/announcements.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Django.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: data privacy (COPPA if minors, FERPA alignment), but typically no full HIPAA/PCI outside payments.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[1][6][8]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  
- Optional 0.1–0.25 FTE **education/compliance advisor** (FERPA/COPPA).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Policies & student-data privacy review: **$5k–$10k**.  

---

## 10. Automotive MVP  
*(Carfax-style history, fleet management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Vehicle records: VIN, make/model, service logs.  
- Fleet dashboard: list, search, status (active, maintenance, idle).  
- Maintenance schedule & reminders.  
- Simple telematics import (file/batch) for mileage/usage initially.  
- Role-based access (fleet manager vs driver).  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or .NET Core.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; time-series DB (e.g., Timescale) later for telemetry.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: standard B2B; if handling driver PII, follow privacy-by-design; if integrating with OEMs, follow their security requirements.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend (API & data modeling).  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- Optional 0.1–0.25 FTE **data/IoT advisor** for telemetry roadmap.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly privacy and contracts: **$3k–$8k**.  

---

**How these numbers relate to 2025 SaaS guides**

- Typical SaaS MVPs in 2025 fall in the **$25k–$80k+** band depending on complexity, with 3–6 month build times.[1][4][6][7][8][10]

mvp_types.name: Real Estate
mvp_types.research_summary:
Below is a concise, comparable set of **MVP baselines** for each vertical. Timelines and costs are normalized to typical 2025 SaaS MVP ranges and 2‑dev teams, using current SaaS/MVP cost guides as benchmarks.[1][4][6][7][8][10]

---

## 1. Fintech / Banking MVP  
*(Stripe-style, Plaid-style, neobank)*

**Core MVP features**

- Auth & onboarding: KYC data capture, email/phone verification, basic profile.  
- Core transaction flow: create customer, link funding source (bank card/ACH), simple charge/payout flow.  
- Ledger & balances: basic transaction log, available vs pending balance.  
- Basic compliance & security: audit logs, role-based access, 2FA, encryption in transit/at rest.  
- Admin console: user search, manual adjustments, risk flags.  
- Integrations: payment gateway (Stripe/Adyen), bank data Aggregator (Plaid-style) or open banking.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: **React** or **Next.js**, TypeScript.  
- Backend: **Node.js** (NestJS) or **Java/Spring Boot** for stricter banking environments.  
- DB: **PostgreSQL** with strict schema & audit tables.  
- Infra: **AWS** (VPC, RDS, ECS/Fargate or EKS, CloudWatch), or GCP/Azure equivalent.  
- Auth/Security: OAuth2/OIDC (Auth0, Cognito), JWT; encryption (KMS), WAF.  
- Compliance context: design toward **PCI-DSS** scope reduction by tokenizing via Stripe/processor; **SOC2-ready** logging & access control.[2][5][10]  

**Timeline (2 devs, focused MVP)**

- With 2 mid-tier devs: **14–18 weeks** (3.5–4.5 months).[1][6][8]  
- With 2 senior devs: **10–14 weeks** (2.5–3.5 months).[4][6]  

**Cost (dev at $60–$150/hr)**  
Assume ~900–1100 total dev hours (including testing/PM).

- Mid-tier devs (avg **$80/hr**):  
  - 1000 hrs × $80 ≈ **$80,000**.  
- Senior devs (avg **$125/hr**):  
  - 1000 hrs × $125 ≈ **$125,000**.  
These sit at the **upper MVP band** for complex/compliant SaaS.[2][6][7]  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend engineer (payments/ledger focus).  
- 1 full‑stack/frontend engineer.  
- 0.25–0.5 FTE **architect/DevOps** (shared).  
- 0.25 FTE **product/BA**.  
- 0.25 FTE **QA**.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **security/compliance consultant** (PCI/SOC2).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- **PCI-DSS (light / SAQ A via Stripe)**: ~$3k–$10k (policies, scans, consulting).  
- **SOC2 Type I readiness** (not full audit): ~$10k–$30k for early-stage program setup.[2]  

---

## 2. Healthcare / Telemedicine MVP  
*(Teladoc-style, patient portal)*

**Core MVP features**

- Secure patient sign-up & profiles; basic provider profiles.  
- Appointment booking & schedule management.  
- Video consult (via Twilio/Zoom SDK) + chat.  
- e-Visit notes & simple encounter history.  
- Basic patient portal: view upcoming visits, simple messages, upload documents.  
- HIPAA-aligned consent, privacy notices, access logs.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, TypeScript.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or **Python/FastAPI**.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; encrypted S3 bucket for documents.  
- Infra: **AWS HIPAA-eligible services** (RDS, EC2/ECS, S3 with BAA), or Azure/GCP HIPAA equivalents.  
- Video: Twilio Programmable Video / Zoom SDK (HIPAA BAA).  
- Compliance: design & hosting under **HIPAA** (BAAs, logging, PHI access control).[2][10]  

**Timeline**

- 2 mid-tier devs: **16–20 weeks** (4–5 months) due to HIPAA constraints.[2][6][8]  
- 2 senior devs: **12–16 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume ~1000–1200 dev hours.

- Mid-tier (avg $80/hr):  
  - 1100 hrs × $80 ≈ **$88,000**.  
- Senior (avg $125/hr):  
  - 1100 hrs × $125 ≈ **$137,500**.  
Healthcare MVPs are typically **$75k+** due to compliance.[2]  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25–0.5 FTE DevOps (HIPAA infra).  
- 0.25 FTE product/BA.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE **HIPAA/privacy consultant** (or vCISO).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- **HIPAA compliance program** (policies, risk assessment, training): ≈ **$15k–$40k** initial.  
- BAAs with cloud/VCP & video provider: usually no fee, but legal review budget ≈ **$5k–$10k**.  

---

## 3. Real Estate MVP  
*(Zillow-style search, basic property management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Property listings with search, filter, maps.  
- Landlord/broker accounts: create/edit/list properties.  
- Tenant/consumer accounts: favorites, inquiries.  
- Simple messaging between parties.  
- Admin panel for moderation.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, TypeScript; Mapbox/Google Maps.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Ruby on Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL + ElasticSearch/Algolia for search later.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure standard web stack.  
- Compliance: basic **data privacy** (GDPR/CCPA-ready) but no heavy sector regulation.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks**.[1][4][6]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume ~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier (avg $80/hr):  
  - 800 hrs × $80 ≈ **$64,000**.  
- Senior (avg $125/hr):  
  - 800 hrs × $125 ≈ **$100,000**.  
Fits typical **mid-complexity SaaS MVP** ranges.[1][4][7]  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend or backend (depending on map/search emphasis).  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly legal/privacy: ToS/Privacy policy, DPA, ≈ **$3k–$8k**.  

---

## 4. Legal Tech MVP  
*(Clio-style, contract management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Client & matter records.  
- Contract upload, tagging, and basic metadata extraction (manual at first).  
- Simple workflow: draft → review → approved; version history.  
- Role-based access (attorney vs staff vs client).  
- Basic reminders: dates, renewals.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Django.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; S3 for document storage (encrypted).  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure, strong logging & access control (SOC2-ready).  
- Optional: basic NLP (Python) later, but not required for MVP.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[1][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume 800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **legal/privacy advisor** (client confidentiality, DPA).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Info security policies / SOC2-readiness: **$10k–$25k** (light).  
- Outside counsel for terms/confidentiality language: **$3k–$7k**.  

---

## 5. Construction MVP  
*(Procore-style, project tracking)*

**Core MVP features**

- Projects & job sites management.  
- Task lists, assignments, deadlines.  
- File sharing for drawings & documents.  
- Simple mobile-friendly field updates (status, photos).  
- Basic activity feed and notifications.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js (web) + React Native (or responsive web) for field use.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or .NET Core.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure standard.  
- Compliance: standard B2B SaaS; no sector-specific regulation beyond safety docs retention.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6][8]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Approx 800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend or mobile-first engineer.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX (jobsite UX).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly legal (safety data handling, contracts): **$3k–$6k**.  

---

## 6. Restaurant / Food Service MVP  
*(Toast-style POS-lite, delivery/ordering platform)*

**Core MVP features**

- Restaurant dashboard: menus, opening hours, order management.  
- Customer UI: browse menu, cart, checkout.  
- Payments: card payments via Stripe/Adyen.  
- Order status workflow (received → in progress → ready/delivering).  
- Basic receipt & order history.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, possibly separate tablet-optimized view.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS).  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: **PCI-DSS scope** minimized via hosted fields/redirect to Stripe/processor.[5]  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks** for online ordering & basic management.[1][4]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$56,000–$72,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$87,500–$112,500**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **security/PCI advisor** (light).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- PCI-DSS SAQ A program: **$3k–$8k** (policies, quarterly scans).  

---

**Cost**

~700–900 hrs.

- Senior ($125/hr): **$87,500–$112,500**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend/mobile.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Typical SaaS legal/privacy work: **$3k–$6k**.  

---

~800–1000 hrs.

- 1 backend.

- **HIPAA compliance program** (policies, risk assessment, training): ≈ **$15k–$40k** initial.  
- BAAs with cloud/VCP & video provider: usually no fee, but legal review budget ≈ **$5k–$10k**.  

---

## 3. Real Estate MVP  
*(Zillow-style search, basic property management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Property listings with search, filter, maps.  
- Landlord/broker accounts: create/edit/list properties.  
- Tenant/consumer accounts: favorites, inquiries.  
- Simple messaging between parties.  
- Admin panel for moderation.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, TypeScript; Mapbox/Google Maps.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Ruby on Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL + ElasticSearch/Algolia for search later.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure standard web stack.  
- Compliance: basic **data privacy** (GDPR/CCPA-ready) but no heavy sector regulation.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks**.[1][4][6]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume ~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier (avg $80/hr):  
  - 800 hrs × $80 ≈ **$64,000**.  
- Senior (avg $125/hr):  
  - 800 hrs × $125 ≈ **$100,000**.  
Fits typical **mid-complexity SaaS MVP** ranges.[1][4][7]  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend or backend (depending on map/search emphasis).  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly legal/privacy: ToS/Privacy policy, DPA, ≈ **$3k–$8k**.  

---

## 4. Legal Tech MVP  
*(Clio-style, contract management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Client & matter records.  
- Contract upload, tagging, and basic metadata extraction (manual at first).  
- Simple workflow: draft → review → approved; version history.  
- Role-based access (attorney vs staff vs client).  
- Basic reminders: dates, renewals.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Django.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; S3 for document storage (encrypted).  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure, strong logging & access control (SOC2-ready).  
- Optional: basic NLP (Python) later, but not required for MVP.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[1][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume 800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **legal/privacy advisor** (client confidentiality, DPA).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Info security policies / SOC2-readiness: **$10k–$25k** (light).  
- Outside counsel for terms/confidentiality language: **$3k–$7k**.  

---

## 5. Construction MVP  
*(Procore-style, project tracking)*

**Core MVP features**

- Projects & job sites management.  
- Task lists, assignments, deadlines.  
- File sharing for drawings & documents.  
- Simple mobile-friendly field updates (status, photos).  
- Basic activity feed and notifications.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js (web) + React Native (or responsive web) for field use.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or .NET Core.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure standard.  
- Compliance: standard B2B SaaS; no sector-specific regulation beyond safety docs retention.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6][8]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Approx 800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend or mobile-first engineer.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX (jobsite UX).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly legal (safety data handling, contracts): **$3k–$6k**.  

---

## 6. Restaurant / Food Service MVP  
*(Toast-style POS-lite, delivery/ordering platform)*

**Core MVP features**

- Restaurant dashboard: menus, opening hours, order management.  
- Customer UI: browse menu, cart, checkout.  
- Payments: card payments via Stripe/Adyen.  
- Order status workflow (received → in progress → ready/delivering).  
- Basic receipt & order history.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, possibly separate tablet-optimized view.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS).  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: **PCI-DSS scope** minimized via hosted fields/redirect to Stripe/processor.[5]  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks** for online ordering & basic management.[1][4]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$56,000–$72,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$87,500–$112,500**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **security/PCI advisor** (light).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- PCI-DSS SAQ A program: **$3k–$8k** (policies, quarterly scans).  

---

## 7. Fitness / Wellness MVP  
*(Mindbody-style scheduling, workout tracker)*

**Core MVP features**

- User profiles with basic health preferences.  
- Class/appointment scheduling with trainers/locations.  
- Simple subscription or pass management.  
- Workout logging (sets, reps, time) and history.  
- Notifications and reminders.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js; React Native or Flutter app if mobile-first.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) / Django / Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: standard AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: general wellness; avoid storing diagnostic/clinical PHI to stay out of strict HIPAA.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks**.[1][4][6]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$56,000–$72,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$87,500–$112,500**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend/mobile.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Typical SaaS legal/privacy work: **$3k–$6k**.  

---

## 8. Travel / Hospitality MVP  
*(TripAdvisor-style, basic booking engine)*

**Core MVP features**

- Property/experience listings + search & filter.  
- User accounts with favorites & reviews (simple).  
- Booking workflow: availability calendar, request/confirm.  
- Payment for bookings (Stripe, Braintree).  
- Basic host dashboard: availability, pricing, reservations list.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; consider Redis for availability lookups later.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: PCI-lite (via processor), GDPR/CCPA readiness.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX (booking UX).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Payment/compliance: **$3k–$8k** PCI-lite.  
- Travel-specific terms & cancellation policies: **$2k–$5k** legal.  

---

## 9. Education / LMS MVP  
*(Canvas-style, Teachable-style)*

**Core MVP features**

- Multi-role accounts: admin, instructor, student.  
- Course creation with modules (video, docs, quizzes basic).  
- Enrollment & access management.  
- Simple progress tracking & gradebook-lite.  
- Messaging/announcements.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Django.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: data privacy (COPPA if minors, FERPA alignment), but typically no full HIPAA/PCI outside payments.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[1][6][8]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  
- Optional 0.1–0.25 FTE **education/compliance advisor** (FERPA/COPPA).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Policies & student-data privacy review: **$5k–$10k**.  

---

## 10. Automotive MVP  
*(Carfax-style history, fleet management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Vehicle records: VIN, make/model, service logs.  
- Fleet dashboard: list, search, status (active, maintenance, idle).  
- Maintenance schedule & reminders.  
- Simple telematics import (file/batch) for mileage/usage initially.  
- Role-based access (fleet manager vs driver).  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or .NET Core.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; time-series DB (e.g., Timescale) later for telemetry.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: standard B2B; if handling driver PII, follow privacy-by-design; if integrating with OEMs, follow their security requirements.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend (API & data modeling).  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- Optional 0.1–0.25 FTE **data/IoT advisor** for telemetry roadmap.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly privacy and contracts: **$3k–$8k**.  

---

**How these numbers relate to 2025 SaaS guides**

- Typical SaaS MVPs in 2025 fall in the **$25k–$80k+** band depending on complexity, with 3–6 month build times.[1][4][6][7][8][10]

mvp_types.name: Construction
mvp_types.research_summary:
Below is a concise, comparable set of **MVP baselines** for each vertical. Timelines and costs are normalized to typical 2025 SaaS MVP ranges and 2‑dev teams, using current SaaS/MVP cost guides as benchmarks.[1][4][6][7][8][10]

---

## 1. Fintech / Banking MVP  
*(Stripe-style, Plaid-style, neobank)*

**Core MVP features**

- Auth & onboarding: KYC data capture, email/phone verification, basic profile.  
- Core transaction flow: create customer, link funding source (bank card/ACH), simple charge/payout flow.  
- Ledger & balances: basic transaction log, available vs pending balance.  
- Basic compliance & security: audit logs, role-based access, 2FA, encryption in transit/at rest.  
- Admin console: user search, manual adjustments, risk flags.  
- Integrations: payment gateway (Stripe/Adyen), bank data Aggregator (Plaid-style) or open banking.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: **React** or **Next.js**, TypeScript.  
- Backend: **Node.js** (NestJS) or **Java/Spring Boot** for stricter banking environments.  
- DB: **PostgreSQL** with strict schema & audit tables.  
- Infra: **AWS** (VPC, RDS, ECS/Fargate or EKS, CloudWatch), or GCP/Azure equivalent.  
- Auth/Security: OAuth2/OIDC (Auth0, Cognito), JWT; encryption (KMS), WAF.  
- Compliance context: design toward **PCI-DSS** scope reduction by tokenizing via Stripe/processor; **SOC2-ready** logging & access control.[2][5][10]  

**Timeline (2 devs, focused MVP)**

- With 2 mid-tier devs: **14–18 weeks** (3.5–4.5 months).[1][6][8]  
- With 2 senior devs: **10–14 weeks** (2.5–3.5 months).[4][6]  

**Cost (dev at $60–$150/hr)**  
Assume ~900–1100 total dev hours (including testing/PM).

- Mid-tier devs (avg **$80/hr**):  
  - 1000 hrs × $80 ≈ **$80,000**.  
- Senior devs (avg **$125/hr**):  
  - 1000 hrs × $125 ≈ **$125,000**.  
These sit at the **upper MVP band** for complex/compliant SaaS.[2][6][7]  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend engineer (payments/ledger focus).  
- 1 full‑stack/frontend engineer.  
- 0.25–0.5 FTE **architect/DevOps** (shared).  
- 0.25 FTE **product/BA**.  
- 0.25 FTE **QA**.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **security/compliance consultant** (PCI/SOC2).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- **PCI-DSS (light / SAQ A via Stripe)**: ~$3k–$10k (policies, scans, consulting).  
- **SOC2 Type I readiness** (not full audit): ~$10k–$30k for early-stage program setup.[2]  

---

## 2. Healthcare / Telemedicine MVP  
*(Teladoc-style, patient portal)*

**Core MVP features**

- Secure patient sign-up & profiles; basic provider profiles.  
- Appointment booking & schedule management.  
- Video consult (via Twilio/Zoom SDK) + chat.  
- e-Visit notes & simple encounter history.  
- Basic patient portal: view upcoming visits, simple messages, upload documents.  
- HIPAA-aligned consent, privacy notices, access logs.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, TypeScript.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or **Python/FastAPI**.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; encrypted S3 bucket for documents.  
- Infra: **AWS HIPAA-eligible services** (RDS, EC2/ECS, S3 with BAA), or Azure/GCP HIPAA equivalents.  
- Video: Twilio Programmable Video / Zoom SDK (HIPAA BAA).  
- Compliance: design & hosting under **HIPAA** (BAAs, logging, PHI access control).[2][10]  

**Timeline**

- 2 mid-tier devs: **16–20 weeks** (4–5 months) due to HIPAA constraints.[2][6][8]  
- 2 senior devs: **12–16 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume ~1000–1200 dev hours.

- Mid-tier (avg $80/hr):  
  - 1100 hrs × $80 ≈ **$88,000**.  
- Senior (avg $125/hr):  
  - 1100 hrs × $125 ≈ **$137,500**.  
Healthcare MVPs are typically **$75k+** due to compliance.[2]  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25–0.5 FTE DevOps (HIPAA infra).  
- 0.25 FTE product/BA.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE **HIPAA/privacy consultant** (or vCISO).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- **HIPAA compliance program** (policies, risk assessment, training): ≈ **$15k–$40k** initial.  
- BAAs with cloud/VCP & video provider: usually no fee, but legal review budget ≈ **$5k–$10k**.  

---

## 3. Real Estate MVP  
*(Zillow-style search, basic property management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Property listings with search, filter, maps.  
- Landlord/broker accounts: create/edit/list properties.  
- Tenant/consumer accounts: favorites, inquiries.  
- Simple messaging between parties.  
- Admin panel for moderation.

- Senior (avg $125/hr):  
  - 800 hrs × $125 ≈ **$100,000**.

- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- Optional 0.1–0.25 FTE **data/IoT advisor** for telemetry roadmap.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly privacy and contracts: **$3k–$8k**.  

---

**How these numbers relate to 2025 SaaS guides**

- Typical SaaS MVPs in 2025 fall in the **$25k–$80k+** band depending on complexity, with 3–6 month build times.[1][4][6][7][8][10]

mvp_types.name: Restaurant/Food Service
mvp_types.research_summary:
Below is a concise, comparable set of **MVP baselines** for each vertical. Timelines and costs are normalized to typical 2025 SaaS MVP ranges and 2‑dev teams, using current SaaS/MVP cost guides as benchmarks.[1][4][6][7][8][10]

---

## 1. Fintech / Banking MVP  
*(Stripe-style, Plaid-style, neobank)*

**Core MVP features**

- Auth & onboarding: KYC data capture, email/phone verification, basic profile.  
- Core transaction flow: create customer, link funding source (bank card/ACH), simple charge/payout flow.  
- Ledger & balances: basic transaction log, available vs pending balance.  
- Basic compliance & security: audit logs, role-based access, 2FA, encryption in transit/at rest.  
- Admin console: user search, manual adjustments, risk flags.  
- Integrations: payment gateway (Stripe/Adyen), bank data Aggregator (Plaid-style) or open banking.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: **React** or **Next.js**, TypeScript.  
- Backend: **Node.js** (NestJS) or **Java/Spring Boot** for stricter banking environments.  
- DB: **PostgreSQL** with strict schema & audit tables.  
- Infra: **AWS** (VPC, RDS, ECS/Fargate or EKS, CloudWatch), or GCP/Azure equivalent.  
- Auth/Security: OAuth2/OIDC (Auth0, Cognito), JWT; encryption (KMS), WAF.  
- Compliance context: design toward **PCI-DSS** scope reduction by tokenizing via Stripe/processor; **SOC2-ready** logging & access control.[2][5][10]  

**Timeline (2 devs, focused MVP)**

- With 2 mid-tier devs: **14–18 weeks** (3.5–4.5 months).[1][6][8]  
- With 2 senior devs: **10–14 weeks** (2.5–3.5 months).[4][6]  

**Cost (dev at $60–$150/hr)**  
Assume ~900–1100 total dev hours (including testing/PM).

- Mid-tier devs (avg **$80/hr**):  
  - 1000 hrs × $80 ≈ **$80,000**.  
- Senior devs (avg **$125/hr**):  
  - 1000 hrs × $125 ≈ **$125,000**.  
These sit at the **upper MVP band** for complex/compliant SaaS.[2][6][7]  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend engineer (payments/ledger focus).  
- 1 full‑stack/frontend engineer.  
- 0.25–0.5 FTE **architect/DevOps** (shared).  
- 0.25 FTE **product/BA**.  
- 0.25 FTE **QA**.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **security/compliance consultant** (PCI/SOC2).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- **PCI-DSS (light / SAQ A via Stripe)**: ~$3k–$10k (policies, scans, consulting).  
- **SOC2 Type I readiness** (not full audit): ~$10k–$30k for early-stage program setup.[2]  

---

## 2. Healthcare / Telemedicine MVP  
*(Teladoc-style, patient portal)*

**Core MVP features**

- Secure patient sign-up & profiles; basic provider profiles.  
- Appointment booking & schedule management.  
- Video consult (via Twilio/Zoom SDK) + chat.  
- e-Visit notes & simple encounter history.  
- Basic patient portal: view upcoming visits, simple messages, upload documents.  
- HIPAA-aligned consent, privacy notices, access logs.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, TypeScript.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or **Python/FastAPI**.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; encrypted S3 bucket for documents.  
- Infra: **AWS HIPAA-eligible services** (RDS, EC2/ECS, S3 with BAA), or Azure/GCP HIPAA equivalents.  
- Video: Twilio Programmable Video / Zoom SDK (HIPAA BAA).  
- Compliance: design & hosting under **HIPAA** (BAAs, logging, PHI access control).[2][10]  

**Timeline**

- 2 mid-tier devs: **16–20 weeks** (4–5 months) due to HIPAA constraints.[2][6][8]  
- 2 senior devs: **12–16 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume ~1000–1200 dev hours.

- Mid-tier (avg $80/hr):  
  - 1100 hrs × $80 ≈ **$88,000**.  
- Senior (avg $125/hr):  
  - 1100 hrs × $125 ≈ **$137,500**.  
Healthcare MVPs are typically **$75k+** due to compliance.[2]  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25–0.5 FTE DevOps (HIPAA infra).  
- 0.25 FTE product/BA.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE **HIPAA/privacy consultant** (or vCISO).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- **HIPAA compliance program** (policies, risk assessment, training): ≈ **$15k–$40k** initial.  
- BAAs with cloud/VCP & video provider: usually no fee, but legal review budget ≈ **$5k–$10k**.  

---

## 3. Real Estate MVP  
*(Zillow-style search, basic property management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Property listings with search, filter, maps.  
- Landlord/broker accounts: create/edit/list properties.  
- Tenant/consumer accounts: favorites, inquiries.  
- Simple messaging between parties.  
- Admin panel for moderation.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, TypeScript; Mapbox/Google Maps.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Ruby on Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL + ElasticSearch/Algolia for search later.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure standard web stack.  
- Compliance: basic **data privacy** (GDPR/CCPA-ready) but no heavy sector regulation.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks**.[1][4][6]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume ~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier (avg $80/hr):  
  - 800 hrs × $80 ≈ **$64,000**.  
- Senior (avg $125/hr):  
  - 800 hrs × $125 ≈ **$100,000**.  
Fits typical **mid-complexity SaaS MVP** ranges.[1][4][7]  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend or backend (depending on map/search emphasis).  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly legal/privacy: ToS/Privacy policy, DPA, ≈ **$3k–$8k**.  

---

## 4. Legal Tech MVP  
*(Clio-style, contract management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Client & matter records.  
- Contract upload, tagging, and basic metadata extraction (manual at first).  
- Simple workflow: draft → review → approved; version history.  
- Role-based access (attorney vs staff vs client).  
- Basic reminders: dates, renewals.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Django.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; S3 for document storage (encrypted).  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure, strong logging & access control (SOC2-ready).  
- Optional: basic NLP (Python) later, but not required for MVP.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[1][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume 800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **legal/privacy advisor** (client confidentiality, DPA).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Info security policies / SOC2-readiness: **$10k–$25k** (light).  
- Outside counsel for terms/confidentiality language: **$3k–$7k**.  

---

## 5. Construction MVP  
*(Procore-style, project tracking)*

**Core MVP features**

- Projects & job sites management.  
- Task lists, assignments, deadlines.  
- File sharing for drawings & documents.  
- Simple mobile-friendly field updates (status, photos).  
- Basic activity feed and notifications.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js (web) + React Native (or responsive web) for field use.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or .NET Core.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure standard.  
- Compliance: standard B2B SaaS; no sector-specific regulation beyond safety docs retention.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6][8]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Approx 800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend or mobile-first engineer.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX (jobsite UX).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly legal (safety data handling, contracts): **$3k–$6k**.  

---

## 6. Restaurant / Food Service MVP  
*(Toast-style POS-lite, delivery/ordering platform)*

**Core MVP features**

- Restaurant dashboard: menus, opening hours, order management.  
- Customer UI: browse menu, cart, checkout.  
- Payments: card payments via Stripe/Adyen.  
- Order status workflow (received → in progress → ready/delivering).  
- Basic receipt & order history.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, possibly separate tablet-optimized view.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS).  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: **PCI-DSS scope** minimized via hosted fields/redirect to Stripe/processor.[5]  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks** for online ordering & basic management.[1][4]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$56,000–$72,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$87,500–$112,500**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **security/PCI advisor** (light).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- PCI-DSS SAQ A program: **$3k–$8k** (policies, quarterly scans).  

---

## 7. Fitness / Wellness MVP  
*(Mindbody-style scheduling, workout tracker)*

**Core MVP features**

- User profiles with basic health preferences.  
- Class/appointment scheduling with trainers/locations.  
- Simple subscription or pass management.  
- Workout logging (sets, reps, time) and history.  
- Notifications and reminders.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js; React Native or Flutter app if mobile-first.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) / Django / Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: standard AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: general wellness; avoid storing diagnostic/clinical PHI to stay out of strict HIPAA.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks**.[1][4][6]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$56,000–$72,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$87,500–$112,500**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend/mobile.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Typical SaaS legal/privacy work: **$3k–$6k**.  

---

## 8. Travel / Hospitality MVP  
*(TripAdvisor-style, basic booking engine)*

**Core MVP features**

- Property/experience listings + search & filter.  
- User accounts with favorites & reviews (simple).  
- Booking workflow: availability calendar, request/confirm.  
- Payment for bookings (Stripe, Braintree).  
- Basic host dashboard: availability, pricing, reservations list.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; consider Redis for availability lookups later.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: PCI-lite (via processor), GDPR/CCPA readiness.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX (booking UX).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Payment/compliance: **$3k–$8k** PCI-lite.  
- Travel-specific terms & cancellation policies: **$2k–$5k** legal.  

---

## 9. Education / LMS MVP  
*(Canvas-style, Teachable-style)*

**Core MVP features**

- Multi-role accounts: admin, instructor, student.  
- Course creation with modules (video, docs, quizzes basic).  
- Enrollment & access management.  
- Simple progress tracking & gradebook-lite.  
- Messaging/announcements.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Django.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: data privacy (COPPA if minors, FERPA alignment), but typically no full HIPAA/PCI outside payments.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[1][6][8]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  
- Optional 0.1–0.25 FTE **education/compliance advisor** (FERPA/COPPA).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Policies & student-data privacy review: **$5k–$10k**.  

---

## 10. Automotive MVP  
*(Carfax-style history, fleet management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Vehicle records: VIN, make/model, service logs.  
- Fleet dashboard: list, search, status (active, maintenance, idle).  
- Maintenance schedule & reminders.  
- Simple telematics import (file/batch) for mileage/usage initially.  
- Role-based access (fleet manager vs driver).  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or .NET Core.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; time-series DB (e.g., Timescale) later for telemetry.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: standard B2B; if handling driver PII, follow privacy-by-design; if integrating with OEMs, follow their security requirements.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend (API & data modeling).  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- Optional 0.1–0.25 FTE **data/IoT advisor** for telemetry roadmap.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly privacy and contracts: **$3k–$8k**.  

---

**How these numbers relate to 2025 SaaS guides**

- Typical SaaS MVPs in 2025 fall in the **$25k–$80k+** band depending on complexity, with 3–6 month build times.[1][4][6][7][8][10]

**Core MVP features**

- User profiles with basic health preferences.  
- Class/appointment scheduling with trainers/locations.  
- Simple subscription or pass management.  
- Workout logging (sets, reps, time) and history.  
- Notifications and reminders.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js; React Native or Flutter app if mobile-first.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) / Django / Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: standard AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: general wellness; avoid storing diagnostic/clinical PHI to stay out of strict HIPAA.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks**.[1][4][6]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$56,000–$72,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$87,500–$112,500**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend/mobile.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Typical SaaS legal/privacy work: **$3k–$6k**.  

---

## 8. Travel / Hospitality MVP  
*(TripAdvisor-style, basic booking engine)*

**Core MVP features**

- Property/experience listings + search & filter.  
- User accounts with favorites & reviews (simple).  
- Booking workflow: availability calendar, request/confirm.  
- Payment for bookings (Stripe, Braintree).  
- Basic host dashboard: availability, pricing, reservations list.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; consider Redis for availability lookups later.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: PCI-lite (via processor), GDPR/CCPA readiness.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX (booking UX).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Payment/compliance: **$3k–$8k** PCI-lite.  
- Travel-specific terms & cancellation policies: **$2k–$5k** legal.  

---

## 9. Education / LMS MVP  
*(Canvas-style, Teachable-style)*

**Core MVP features**

- Multi-role accounts: admin, instructor, student.  
- Course creation with modules (video, docs, quizzes basic).  
- Enrollment & access management.  
- Simple progress tracking & gradebook-lite.  
- Messaging/announcements.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Django.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: data privacy (COPPA if minors, FERPA alignment), but typically no full HIPAA/PCI outside payments.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[1][6][8]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  
- Optional 0.1–0.25 FTE **education/compliance advisor** (FERPA/COPPA).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Policies & student-data privacy review: **$5k–$10k**.  

---

## 10. Automotive MVP  
*(Carfax-style history, fleet management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Vehicle records: VIN, make/model, service logs.  
- Fleet dashboard: list, search, status (active, maintenance, idle).  
- Maintenance schedule & reminders.  
- Simple telematics import (file/batch) for mileage/usage initially.  
- Role-based access (fleet manager vs driver).  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or .NET Core.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; time-series DB (e.g., Timescale) later for telemetry.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: standard B2B; if handling driver PII, follow privacy-by-design; if integrating with OEMs, follow their security requirements.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend (API & data modeling).  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- Optional 0.1–0.25 FTE **data/IoT advisor** for telemetry roadmap.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly privacy and contracts: **$3k–$8k**.  

---

**How these numbers relate to 2025 SaaS guides**

- Typical SaaS MVPs in 2025 fall in the **$25k–$80k+** band depending on complexity, with 3–6 month build times.[1][4][6][7][8][10]

mvp_types.name: Travel/Hospitality
mvp_types.research_summary:
Below is a concise, comparable set of **MVP baselines** for each vertical. Timelines and costs are normalized to typical 2025 SaaS MVP ranges and 2‑dev teams, using current SaaS/MVP cost guides as benchmarks.[1][4][6][7][8][10]

---

## 1. Fintech / Banking MVP  
*(Stripe-style, Plaid-style, neobank)*

**Core MVP features**

- Auth & onboarding: KYC data capture, email/phone verification, basic profile.  
- Core transaction flow: create customer, link funding source (bank card/ACH), simple charge/payout flow.  
- Ledger & balances: basic transaction log, available vs pending balance.  
- Basic compliance & security: audit logs, role-based access, 2FA, encryption in transit/at rest.  
- Admin console: user search, manual adjustments, risk flags.  
- Integrations: payment gateway (Stripe/Adyen), bank data Aggregator (Plaid-style) or open banking.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: **React** or **Next.js**, TypeScript.  
- Backend: **Node.js** (NestJS) or **Java/Spring Boot** for stricter banking environments.  
- DB: **PostgreSQL** with strict schema & audit tables.  
- Infra: **AWS** (VPC, RDS, ECS/Fargate or EKS, CloudWatch), or GCP/Azure equivalent.  
- Auth/Security: OAuth2/OIDC (Auth0, Cognito), JWT; encryption (KMS), WAF.  
- Compliance context: design toward **PCI-DSS** scope reduction by tokenizing via Stripe/processor; **SOC2-ready** logging & access control.[2][5][10]  

**Timeline (2 devs, focused MVP)**

- With 2 mid-tier devs: **14–18 weeks** (3.5–4.5 months).[1][6][8]  
- With 2 senior devs: **10–14 weeks** (2.5–3.5 months).[4][6]  

**Cost (dev at $60–$150/hr)**  
Assume ~900–1100 total dev hours (including testing/PM).

- Mid-tier devs (avg **$80/hr**):  
  - 1000 hrs × $80 ≈ **$80,000**.  
- Senior devs (avg **$125/hr**):  
  - 1000 hrs × $125 ≈ **$125,000**.  
These sit at the **upper MVP band** for complex/compliant SaaS.[2][6][7]  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend engineer (payments/ledger focus).  
- 1 full‑stack/frontend engineer.  
- 0.25–0.5 FTE **architect/DevOps** (shared).  
- 0.25 FTE **product/BA**.  
- 0.25 FTE **QA**.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **security/compliance consultant** (PCI/SOC2).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- **PCI-DSS (light / SAQ A via Stripe)**: ~$3k–$10k (policies, scans, consulting).  
- **SOC2 Type I readiness** (not full audit): ~$10k–$30k for early-stage program setup.[2]  

---

## 2. Healthcare / Telemedicine MVP  
*(Teladoc-style, patient portal)*

**Core MVP features**

- Secure patient sign-up & profiles; basic provider profiles.  
- Appointment booking & schedule management.  
- Video consult (via Twilio/Zoom SDK) + chat.  
- e-Visit notes & simple encounter history.  
- Basic patient portal: view upcoming visits, simple messages, upload documents.  
- HIPAA-aligned consent, privacy notices, access logs.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, TypeScript.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or **Python/FastAPI**.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; encrypted S3 bucket for documents.  
- Infra: **AWS HIPAA-eligible services** (RDS, EC2/ECS, S3 with BAA), or Azure/GCP HIPAA equivalents.  
- Video: Twilio Programmable Video / Zoom SDK (HIPAA BAA).  
- Compliance: design & hosting under **HIPAA** (BAAs, logging, PHI access control).[2][10]  

**Timeline**

- 2 mid-tier devs: **16–20 weeks** (4–5 months) due to HIPAA constraints.[2][6][8]  
- 2 senior devs: **12–16 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume ~1000–1200 dev hours.

- Mid-tier (avg $80/hr):  
  - 1100 hrs × $80 ≈ **$88,000**.  
- Senior (avg $125/hr):  
  - 1100 hrs × $125 ≈ **$137,500**.  
Healthcare MVPs are typically **$75k+** due to compliance.[2]  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25–0.5 FTE DevOps (HIPAA infra).  
- 0.25 FTE product/BA.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE **HIPAA/privacy consultant** (or vCISO).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- **HIPAA compliance program** (policies, risk assessment, training): ≈ **$15k–$40k** initial.  
- BAAs with cloud/VCP & video provider: usually no fee, but legal review budget ≈ **$5k–$10k**.  

---

## 3. Real Estate MVP  
*(Zillow-style search, basic property management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Property listings with search, filter, maps.  
- Landlord/broker accounts: create/edit/list properties.  
- Tenant/consumer accounts: favorites, inquiries.  
- Simple messaging between parties.  
- Admin panel for moderation.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, TypeScript; Mapbox/Google Maps.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Ruby on Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL + ElasticSearch/Algolia for search later.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure standard web stack.  
- Compliance: basic **data privacy** (GDPR/CCPA-ready) but no heavy sector regulation.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks**.[1][4][6]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume ~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier (avg $80/hr):  
  - 800 hrs × $80 ≈ **$64,000**.  
- Senior (avg $125/hr):  
  - 800 hrs × $125 ≈ **$100,000**.  
Fits typical **mid-complexity SaaS MVP** ranges.[1][4][7]  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend or backend (depending on map/search emphasis).  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly legal/privacy: ToS/Privacy policy, DPA, ≈ **$3k–$8k**.  

---

## 4. Legal Tech MVP  
*(Clio-style, contract management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Client & matter records.  
- Contract upload, tagging, and basic metadata extraction (manual at first).  
- Simple workflow: draft → review → approved; version history.  
- Role-based access (attorney vs staff vs client).  
- Basic reminders: dates, renewals.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Django.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; S3 for document storage (encrypted).  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure, strong logging & access control (SOC2-ready).  
- Optional: basic NLP (Python) later, but not required for MVP.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[1][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume 800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **legal/privacy advisor** (client confidentiality, DPA).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Info security policies / SOC2-readiness: **$10k–$25k** (light).  
- Outside counsel for terms/confidentiality language: **$3k–$7k**.  

---

## 5. Construction MVP  
*(Procore-style, project tracking)*

**Core MVP features**

- Projects & job sites management.  
- Task lists, assignments, deadlines.  
- File sharing for drawings & documents.  
- Simple mobile-friendly field updates (status, photos).  
- Basic activity feed and notifications.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js (web) + React Native (or responsive web) for field use.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or .NET Core.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure standard.  
- Compliance: standard B2B SaaS; no sector-specific regulation beyond safety docs retention.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6][8]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Approx 800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend or mobile-first engineer.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX (jobsite UX).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly legal (safety data handling, contracts): **$3k–$6k**.  

---

## 6. Restaurant / Food Service MVP  
*(Toast-style POS-lite, delivery/ordering platform)*

**Core MVP features**

- Restaurant dashboard: menus, opening hours, order management.  
- Customer UI: browse menu, cart, checkout.  
- Payments: card payments via Stripe/Adyen.  
- Order status workflow (received → in progress → ready/delivering).  
- Basic receipt & order history.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, possibly separate tablet-optimized view.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS).  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: **PCI-DSS scope** minimized via hosted fields/redirect to Stripe/processor.[5]  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks** for online ordering & basic management.[1][4]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$56,000–$72,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$87,500–$112,500**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **security/PCI advisor** (light).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- PCI-DSS SAQ A program: **$3k–$8k** (policies, quarterly scans).  

---

## 7. Fitness / Wellness MVP  
*(Mindbody-style scheduling, workout tracker)*

**Core MVP features**

- User profiles with basic health preferences.

- Simple subscription or pass management.  
- Workout logging (sets, reps, time) and history.

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks**.[1][4][6]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$56,000–$72,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$87,500–$112,500**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend/mobile.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Typical SaaS legal/privacy work: **$3k–$6k**.  

---

*(TripAdvisor-style, basic booking engine)*

**Core MVP features**

- Property/experience listings + search & filter.  
- User accounts with favorites & reviews (simple).  
- Booking workflow: availability calendar, request/confirm.

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX (booking UX).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Payment/compliance: **$3k–$8k** PCI-lite.  
- Travel-specific terms & cancellation policies: **$2k–$5k** legal.

- Compliance: basic **data privacy** (GDPR/CCPA-ready) but no heavy sector regulation.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks**.[1][4][6]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume ~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier (avg $80/hr):  
  - 800 hrs × $80 ≈ **$64,000**.  
- Senior (avg $125/hr):  
  - 800 hrs × $125 ≈ **$100,000**.  
Fits typical **mid-complexity SaaS MVP** ranges.[1][4][7]  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend or backend (depending on map/search emphasis).  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly legal/privacy: ToS/Privacy policy, DPA, ≈ **$3k–$8k**.  

---

## 4. Legal Tech MVP  
*(Clio-style, contract management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Client & matter records.  
- Contract upload, tagging, and basic metadata extraction (manual at first).  
- Simple workflow: draft → review → approved; version history.  
- Role-based access (attorney vs staff vs client).  
- Basic reminders: dates, renewals.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Django.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; S3 for document storage (encrypted).  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure, strong logging & access control (SOC2-ready).  
- Optional: basic NLP (Python) later, but not required for MVP.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[1][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume 800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **legal/privacy advisor** (client confidentiality, DPA).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Info security policies / SOC2-readiness: **$10k–$25k** (light).  
- Outside counsel for terms/confidentiality language: **$3k–$7k**.  

---

## 5. Construction MVP  
*(Procore-style, project tracking)*

**Core MVP features**

- Projects & job sites management.  
- Task lists, assignments, deadlines.  
- File sharing for drawings & documents.  
- Simple mobile-friendly field updates (status, photos).  
- Basic activity feed and notifications.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js (web) + React Native (or responsive web) for field use.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or .NET Core.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure standard.  
- Compliance: standard B2B SaaS; no sector-specific regulation beyond safety docs retention.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6][8]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Approx 800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend or mobile-first engineer.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX (jobsite UX).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly legal (safety data handling, contracts): **$3k–$6k**.  

---

## 6. Restaurant / Food Service MVP  
*(Toast-style POS-lite, delivery/ordering platform)*

**Core MVP features**

- Restaurant dashboard: menus, opening hours, order management.  
- Customer UI: browse menu, cart, checkout.  
- Payments: card payments via Stripe/Adyen.  
- Order status workflow (received → in progress → ready/delivering).  
- Basic receipt & order history.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, possibly separate tablet-optimized view.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS).  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: **PCI-DSS scope** minimized via hosted fields/redirect to Stripe/processor.[5]  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks** for online ordering & basic management.[1][4]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$56,000–$72,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$87,500–$112,500**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **security/PCI advisor** (light).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- PCI-DSS SAQ A program: **$3k–$8k** (policies, quarterly scans).  

---

## 7. Fitness / Wellness MVP  
*(Mindbody-style scheduling, workout tracker)*

**Core MVP features**

- User profiles with basic health preferences.  
- Class/appointment scheduling with trainers/locations.  
- Simple subscription or pass management.  
- Workout logging (sets, reps, time) and history.  
- Notifications and reminders.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js; React Native or Flutter app if mobile-first.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) / Django / Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: standard AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: general wellness; avoid storing diagnostic/clinical PHI to stay out of strict HIPAA.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks**.[1][4][6]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~700–900 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$56,000–$72,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$87,500–$112,500**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 full‑stack.  
- 1 frontend/mobile.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Typical SaaS legal/privacy work: **$3k–$6k**.  

---

## 8. Travel / Hospitality MVP  
*(TripAdvisor-style, basic booking engine)*

**Core MVP features**

- Property/experience listings + search & filter.  
- User accounts with favorites & reviews (simple).  
- Booking workflow: availability calendar, request/confirm.  
- Payment for bookings (Stripe, Braintree).  
- Basic host dashboard: availability, pricing, reservations list.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; consider Redis for availability lookups later.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: PCI-lite (via processor), GDPR/CCPA readiness.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX (booking UX).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Payment/compliance: **$3k–$8k** PCI-lite.  
- Travel-specific terms & cancellation policies: **$2k–$5k** legal.  

---

## 9. Education / LMS MVP  
*(Canvas-style, Teachable-style)*

**Core MVP features**

- Multi-role accounts: admin, instructor, student.  
- Course creation with modules (video, docs, quizzes basic).  
- Enrollment & access management.  
- Simple progress tracking & gradebook-lite.  
- Messaging/announcements.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Django.  
- DB: PostgreSQL.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: data privacy (COPPA if minors, FERPA alignment), but typically no full HIPAA/PCI outside payments.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[1][6][8]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.  
- Optional 0.1–0.25 FTE **education/compliance advisor** (FERPA/COPPA).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Policies & student-data privacy review: **$5k–$10k**.  

---

## 10. Automotive MVP  
*(Carfax-style history, fleet management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Vehicle records: VIN, make/model, service logs.  
- Fleet dashboard: list, search, status (active, maintenance, idle).  
- Maintenance schedule & reminders.  
- Simple telematics import (file/batch) for mileage/usage initially.  
- Role-based access (fleet manager vs driver).  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or .NET Core.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; time-series DB (e.g., Timescale) later for telemetry.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure.  
- Compliance: standard B2B; if handling driver PII, follow privacy-by-design; if integrating with OEMs, follow their security requirements.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **12–16 weeks**.[4][6]  
- Senior: **10–14 weeks**.  

**Cost**

~800–1000 hrs.

- Mid-tier ($80/hr): **$64,000–$80,000**.  
- Senior ($125/hr): **$100,000–$125,000**.  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend (API & data modeling).  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25 FTE DevOps.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- Optional 0.1–0.25 FTE **data/IoT advisor** for telemetry roadmap.  

**Additional compliance costs**

- Mostly privacy and contracts: **$3k–$8k**.  

---

**How these numbers relate to 2025 SaaS guides**

- Typical SaaS MVPs in 2025 fall in the **$25k–$80k+** band depending on complexity, with 3–6 month build times.[1][4][6][7][8][10]

mvp_types.name: Automotive
mvp_types.research_summary:
Below is a concise, comparable set of **MVP baselines** for each vertical. Timelines and costs are normalized to typical 2025 SaaS MVP ranges and 2‑dev teams, using current SaaS/MVP cost guides as benchmarks.[1][4][6][7][8][10]

---

## 1. Fintech / Banking MVP  
*(Stripe-style, Plaid-style, neobank)*

**Core MVP features**

- Auth & onboarding: KYC data capture, email/phone verification, basic profile.  
- Core transaction flow: create customer, link funding source (bank card/ACH), simple charge/payout flow.  
- Ledger & balances: basic transaction log, available vs pending balance.  
- Basic compliance & security: audit logs, role-based access, 2FA, encryption in transit/at rest.  
- Admin console: user search, manual adjustments, risk flags.  
- Integrations: payment gateway (Stripe/Adyen), bank data Aggregator (Plaid-style) or open banking.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: **React** or **Next.js**, TypeScript.  
- Backend: **Node.js** (NestJS) or **Java/Spring Boot** for stricter banking environments.  
- DB: **PostgreSQL** with strict schema & audit tables.  
- Infra: **AWS** (VPC, RDS, ECS/Fargate or EKS, CloudWatch), or GCP/Azure equivalent.  
- Auth/Security: OAuth2/OIDC (Auth0, Cognito), JWT; encryption (KMS), WAF.  
- Compliance context: design toward **PCI-DSS** scope reduction by tokenizing via Stripe/processor; **SOC2-ready** logging & access control.[2][5][10]  

**Timeline (2 devs, focused MVP)**

- With 2 mid-tier devs: **14–18 weeks** (3.5–4.5 months).[1][6][8]  
- With 2 senior devs: **10–14 weeks** (2.5–3.5 months).[4][6]  

**Cost (dev at $60–$150/hr)**  
Assume ~900–1100 total dev hours (including testing/PM).

- Mid-tier devs (avg **$80/hr**):  
  - 1000 hrs × $80 ≈ **$80,000**.  
- Senior devs (avg **$125/hr**):  
  - 1000 hrs × $125 ≈ **$125,000**.  
These sit at the **upper MVP band** for complex/compliant SaaS.[2][6][7]  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend engineer (payments/ledger focus).  
- 1 full‑stack/frontend engineer.  
- 0.25–0.5 FTE **architect/DevOps** (shared).  
- 0.25 FTE **product/BA**.  
- 0.25 FTE **QA**.  
- 0.1–0.25 FTE **security/compliance consultant** (PCI/SOC2).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- **PCI-DSS (light / SAQ A via Stripe)**: ~$3k–$10k (policies, scans, consulting).  
- **SOC2 Type I readiness** (not full audit): ~$10k–$30k for early-stage program setup.[2]  

---

## 2. Healthcare / Telemedicine MVP  
*(Teladoc-style, patient portal)*

**Core MVP features**

- Secure patient sign-up & profiles; basic provider profiles.  
- Appointment booking & schedule management.  
- Video consult (via Twilio/Zoom SDK) + chat.  
- e-Visit notes & simple encounter history.  
- Basic patient portal: view upcoming visits, simple messages, upload documents.  
- HIPAA-aligned consent, privacy notices, access logs.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, TypeScript.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or **Python/FastAPI**.  
- DB: PostgreSQL; encrypted S3 bucket for documents.  
- Infra: **AWS HIPAA-eligible services** (RDS, EC2/ECS, S3 with BAA), or Azure/GCP HIPAA equivalents.  
- Video: Twilio Programmable Video / Zoom SDK (HIPAA BAA).  
- Compliance: design & hosting under **HIPAA** (BAAs, logging, PHI access control).[2][10]  

**Timeline**

- 2 mid-tier devs: **16–20 weeks** (4–5 months) due to HIPAA constraints.[2][6][8]  
- 2 senior devs: **12–16 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume ~1000–1200 dev hours.

- Mid-tier (avg $80/hr):  
  - 1100 hrs × $80 ≈ **$88,000**.  
- Senior (avg $125/hr):  
  - 1100 hrs × $125 ≈ **$137,500**.  
Healthcare MVPs are typically **$75k+** due to compliance.[2]  

**Team composition**

- 1 backend.  
- 1 frontend.  
- 0.25–0.5 FTE DevOps (HIPAA infra).  
- 0.25 FTE product/BA.  
- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE **HIPAA/privacy consultant** (or vCISO).  

**Additional compliance costs**

- **HIPAA compliance program** (policies, risk assessment, training): ≈ **$15k–$40k** initial.  
- BAAs with cloud/VCP & video provider: usually no fee, but legal review budget ≈ **$5k–$10k**.  

---

## 3. Real Estate MVP  
*(Zillow-style search, basic property management)*

**Core MVP features**

- Property listings with search, filter, maps.  
- Landlord/broker accounts: create/edit/list properties.  
- Tenant/consumer accounts: favorites, inquiries.  
- Simple messaging between parties.  
- Admin panel for moderation.  

**Recommended tech stack**

- Frontend: React/Next.js, TypeScript; Mapbox/Google Maps.  
- Backend: Node.js (NestJS) or Ruby on Rails.  
- DB: PostgreSQL + ElasticSearch/Algolia for search later.  
- Infra: AWS/GCP/Azure standard web stack.  
- Compliance: basic **data privacy** (GDPR/CCPA-ready) but no heavy sector regulation.  

**Timeline**

- Mid-tier: **10–14 weeks**.[1][4][6]  
- Senior: **8–12 weeks**.  

**Cost**

Assume ~700–900 hrs.

- Senior (avg $125/hr):  
  - 800 hrs × $125 ≈ **$100,000**.

- 1 full‑stack.

- 0.25 FTE QA.  
- 0.25 FTE product/UX.
